    A gestor thats manage certain group of ceilings.

      • CeilingManager

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(int[] layers,
                java.lang.String color)
        Adds a new ceiling to the ceiling gestor
        Parameters:
        layers - A integers array with the value of the resistances.
        color - The color of the ceiling(cannot be repeated)

      • addAll

        public void addAll(int layer)
        Adds a new resistance in all the ceilings of the gestor.
        Parameters:
        layer - The value of the resistance that have the new resistance.

      • addCapa

        public void addCapa(java.lang.String color,
                    int layer)
        Adds a new resistance in one ceiling of the gestor.
        Parameters:
        color - The color of the ceiling that is going to have a new layer.
        layer - The value of the resistance that have the new resistance.

      • deleteAll

        public void deleteAll()
        Deletes the first resistance in all the ceilings of the gestor.

      • deleteLayer

        public void deleteLayer(java.lang.String delColor)
        Delete a ceiling from the gestor.
        Parameters:
        delColor - The color of the ceiling that is going to be deleted.

      • equal

        public boolean equal(java.lang.String tree1,
                     java.lang.String tree2)
        Comparates two ceilings for their tree form.
        Parameters:
        tree1 - The color of the first ceiling that is going to be compared.
        tree2 - The color of the second ceiling that is going to be compared.
        Returns:
        The boolean value about if the two ceilings have the same tree form.
